title: Straight Paper Straws
features: Manufactured using premium food-grade multi-layer paper, these straight paper straws offer excellent strength, durability, and safety while remaining completely plastic-free and environmentally responsible.
Designed to maintain rigidity and performance for extended use in both hot and cold beverages, making them suitable for cafés, restaurants, hotels, and large-scale commercial applications.
100% biodegradable and compostable eco-friendly alternative to plastic straws.
Available in multiple diameters and lengths with custom branding options.

title: U-Bend Paper Straw For Tetra Pack
features: Special U-bend design allows easy and accurate insertion into tetra pack openings, ensuring a comfortable, hygienic, and spill-free drinking experience, especially for kids and on-the-go use.
Made from high-quality, food-grade multi-layer paper that provides the right balance of flexibility and strength, maintaining shape and performance during use.
100% biodegradable, compostable, and completely plastic-free.
Perfectly suitable for tetra packs, juice boxes, and aseptic beverage cartons.

title: Diagonal Cut Straight Straw for Tetra Pack/Boba Tea
features: Diagonal cut tip allows easy piercing of tetra pack seals and smooth entry into cup lids, making it ideal for juice packs, bubble tea, and thick beverages.
Made from high-quality food-grade multi-layer paper that provides excellent strength and rigidity, ensuring reliable performance even with dense drinks like boba tea.
Eco-friendly, biodegradable, and completely plastic-free paper straw.
Available in multiple diameters and lengths to suit tetra packs and boba tea applications.

title: 3-Ply Face Mask
features: Reliable 3-ply face mask offering protection against dust, bacteria, and harmful particles, designed for comfort and daily use.
Soft elastic ear loops for a comfortable, pressure-free fit.
Breathable material allows easy airflow during long use.
Adjustable nose clip ensures snug fit and reduces fogging.
Hypoallergenic materials prevent irritation and allergies.
Customization and bulk supply options available.
